channel.title: Compiling WhiteScape in *nix operating sytems
channel.description:
[ul][li]Open the Terminal[/li] [li]Make sure you can use the javac command by typing it in the Terminal.[/li] [li]Type cd /sourcefiledirectory/[/li] [li]After using the cd command to change the directory, type "javac file1.java file2.java etc.[/li][/ul]
If any of your classpaths need a library, use this command: javac -classpath /Library/.../xyz.jar file1.java file2.java
Enjoy, fellow *nix users ;)

item.title: Compiling WhiteScape in *nix operating sytems
